duties_responsibilities.duty: Interact with existing and potential customers, developing and maintaining relationships both in person and electronically.
Negotiate with manufacturers, distributors, and contractors to come to a solution that works for everyone.
Take on a consultant role at the contractor level, providing value through information and products.
Utilize sales forecasting via electronic tools and proficient in Microsoft Office Suite applications.
Present in front of small audiences (customers/prospects) and educate about new and innovative products and services.
